OOC: This post is because nobody misses Weight. Face it, he sucks, that's t=
he reason. Why do you think Serge ate him? He was so damn annoying! Anyway,=
 this post is just for fun, be sure to ridicule and tease Weight all you wa=
nt to.

Weight wakes up. He had a weird dream that a big T-rex bot ate him =
like a pill. He looks around.

"Damn! How come I always dream about reality=
?" Weight says. He sees he is inside Serge, hsi stomach, particularly. He p=
ulls out his blaster. He melted down from the acid. His own Mech Fluid was =
spilled around, there was lots of water, and it was dyed blue from mech flu=
id. They came from acid burns. He pulls out a small knife. He never intende=
d to use it for violence, he always wanted to stop violence. He thrusts it =
into Serge's meaty walls. The knife bends. Weight flicks it and finds it's =
rubbery. He finds there isn't enough room to stand up. Why this? All he was=
 trying to do is ask the tyrant to go away and leave Land Mine alone, and t=
his bastard ate him! This wasn't humane! Of course, you'd expect this from =
a Predacon, but from a Maximal? What kind of bot was this? Not a very kind =
one, no way! Weight pulls out a grapp.ling hook for climbing cliffs. It was=
 turned into soup. He cries out loud in frustration and pushes the bodies o=
f Testifier and Cave-In off of himself. He crosses his arms angrily.

"Stup=
id Predacons, they probably don't even realize I'm gone." He says...
